channel.title: Career stats on Home
channel.description: Recent content in Career stats on Home

item.title: Career stats
item.description: This page shows statistics of players’ battles fought during their Blitz “career” until the end of update 11.4. In total, 1.34M players played during update 11.4. Battles per Player Number of career/cumulative battles per player in the end of the update 11.
